DataElement.preferredDefinition: grafting of Primitive blood cells derived from embryonic mesenchyme capable of differentiating into any of the blood cell line progenitor cells (erythroblasts, young granulocytic series cells, megakaryocytes, etc.) from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual The grafting of tissues from one individual to another or place to place within a single individual. with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.
